Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Archer/Wood
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are rerouted via Damen, Blue Island, Western, 35th Street, Leavitt, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage nr Archer/Wood

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Blue Island, Western, 35th Street, Leavitt, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage near Archer/Wood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at South Shore/80th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 71 71st/South Shore buses are rerouted via Commercial, Exchange, 79th & South Shore: due to, street blockage near South Shore/80th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, Exchange, 79th and South Shore: due to, street blockage near South Shore/80th.

Allow extra travel time.
